EnterpriseCAFor.meaning: The Enterprise Certification Authority node is the enrollment service LDAP object for the target Root Certification Authority node. An attacker may perform several attacks that rely on this relationship. This relationship alone is not enough to escalate rights or impersonate other principals. This relationship may contribute to other relationships and attributes, from which an escalation opportunity may emerge.
EnterpriseCAFor.common: 不可直接利用 - 此关系本身不足以提升权限或冒充其他主体，但可能为其他攻击关系提供支撑
